HermesPy Documentation
======================

Welcome to the official documentation of hermespy.
This documentation provides a

* general high-level introduction into the simulator,
* autogenerated low-level documentation for modules, classes, and methods.

Installation instructions, feature set, and release plan can be found on `GitHub <https://github.com/Barkhausen-Institut/hermespy/>`_.
The instructions should be read prior to this documentaiton.

.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 3
   :glob:

   self
   getting_started
   high_level_description
   explanation_platform_approach
   parameter_description
   Modules <modules>
